tool_description: Assesses the difficulty level of activities relative to a specific child's abilities and developmental stage, providing appropriate challenge ratings.

activity_ids.description: List of activity IDs to assess difficulty for

skill_level.description: Child's general skill level: beginner, developing, proficient, or advanced

previous_experience.description: Types of activities the child has previous experience with

challenge_preference.description: Preferred challenge level: easy, moderate, or challenging

error_messages: Empty activity list: At least one activity ID must be provided.
Invalid age: child_age_months must be between 6 and 216 months.
Invalid skill level: Must be one of [beginner, developing, proficient, advanced].
Invalid challenge preference: Must be one of [easy, moderate, challenging].
Activity not found: One or more activity IDs are not recognized.
usage: Provide activity IDs and child's age for difficulty assessment. Optionally specify skill level, previous experience, and challenge preference for personalized difficulty ratings.

difficulty_ratings.description: Difficulty rating for each activity (too_easy, appropriate, challenging, too_hard)

recommended_activities.description: Activity IDs with appropriate difficulty levels

modification_suggestions.description: Suggestions to modify difficulty for each activity

skill_gaps.description: Skills that may need development before attempting certain activities
